description.para: Obtain reference points to graphics system main window (CForm) object class smart pointer.

return.para: Return reference of object class smart pointer points to graphics system main window object. The return value is reference of CFormRef type.

remarks.para: Graphics system main window is: When graphics system starts up, a full screen window is automatically supported. Closing that window causes the program to exit directly. In user defined CAR file, if and only if component has the graphics attribute,then the user can directly invoke MyMainForm function in the application. Now, the user can invoke method in CForm class to do various operations directly on the main window through return value of MyMainForm parameter.If you want to exit user program, you need to invoke Close method, the syntax is: MyMainForm().Close() .

system.system_name: Windows 2000 or later; Elastos 2.0 or later.
